Reviews.Content: bad • dishonest total price hotel collect cash credit cards 2 euronight checkout sound suspicious worst crooks incompetent neither website nor email confirmation mentioned secret tax payable cash checkout sat lobby using wifi little bit stung checking including elderly ladies euros leaving airport atm person assume written confirmation total price bad bad bad • wifi hotel despite advertising dead spots front desk hotel move refund amount paid “hotel wifi • front desk staff indifferent it’s interruption job • carpets deep green vacuumed serious edge vacuuming • continental breakfast included – 9a sunday hardy takes advantage time • update extend breakfast sunday post extension notice sunday morning – stupid • towels weird – aren’t common bathroom towels tablecloths don’t absorb • shower tiny phone booth couldn’t • previous reviews noted uncomfortable beds found mine nice • overall hotel nice – looks reasonably modern • location easy walking distance train station – don’t follow instructions hotels website subway – ridiculous subway short distance
